title: Controlled by His Voice 4
description: Book 4 of the Controlled by His Voice seriesMeghan is on edge.After a harrowing incident with her ex-boyfriend, she finds herself driving in a blinding snowstorm to her mentor's seaside mansion.All Meghan knows is that she needs to see his face. No amount of snow will get in her way.But when she gets there, a surprise is waiting for her... a surprise that triggers an accident.Bruised and bleeding, Meghan finds herself in Tristan's care as the storm rages. But her actions have made him distant. She soon realizes the folly of what she's done. It may be too late to recapture the bliss of submission training under the command of his voice.Then much to Meghan's surprise and delight, a new chapter in their relationship opens... but with it comes a glimpse into the dark demons that haunt Tristan's past. Demons that may curse any chance for Meghan's happiness.Approximate length: 13,000 words (a novelette)Content Warning: This erotic romance contains graphic scenes of intimacy. For mature adults 18 years and older ONLY!Themes: College, New Adult Romance, Age Gap, Dominance, Submission, Alpha Male, Billionaire.
author: Skylar Cross
